name: SOS Survival Escape
description:
SOS Survival Escape is an Adventure and Action-Packed Survival game.
You will be dropped from a helicopter onto a lonely island, your only goal is to collect all gems and get to the evacuation helicopter in time! Sounds pretty easy? Well, the island dwelling dark mysterious creatures won't make your job so trivial.
With twenty various levels full of dangerous monsters and lost artifacts, you'll need to outthink, outrun and outsmart your fate. Use the environment smartly to gain advantage! Collect materials and craft new useful items, scavenge boxes and barrels, chop down trees with axe to get wood and even try to fish in the ocean! Enjoy the advanced crafting and looting system and explore the secrets of the island in order to collect all gems and complete your mission!
